name: River Irwell Floodplain Zone
description: This area has a medium flood risk due to proximity to the River Irwell and historically high water levels during heavy rainfall.

name: South Manchester Low-Risk Zone
description: Low flood risk area with improved drainage systems and minimal exposure to nearby waterways.
currentIssues: Occasional minor ponding after prolonged rain

name: Manchester Central Surface Water Zone
description: High flood risk zone due to frequent surface water accumulation and poor runoff during storms.
